name: Don't Mine Me (Jasmin Heinemann)
description:
Berlin Mini Game Jam June 2015 Game

Top Down labyrinth game in the dark. Made for a 2 vs. 2 player mode on a special one-button arcade machine for 4 players. Use your flashlight and mines to tear your opponent into pieces to be the first to collect the coins.

Team:

Game Design: Marlon Panta & Jasmin Heinemann

Art: Melina Cornelius & Tristan Dahl (Maker of the Arcade Machine!)

Code: Dennis Lieu & Viktor Pekar

Controls:

Movement:

Player 1 or Team 1 : A and D (Left and Right)

Player 2 or Team 2: J and L (Left and Right)

Plant Mine:

Press both direction buttons at the same time

Goal:

Collect as fast as you can two golden coins to win the round!
